about_the_game:
Extend your train and create a survival utility

find a carriage to enhance confined spaces, optimizing room utility for maximum benefit. Certain carriages come equipped with distinctive technologies and capabilities to amplify their functionality further.

Direct your crew onboard the train
crew with skills, needs, and compelling stories. Take command, strategically schedule their tasks, and efforts to craft essential items, engage in battles, and maintain their morale in the journey of an apocalyptic world.

Discover the truth of the world, Being your journey
Every journey has an adventure story waiting for it, waiting to be unraveled through the exploration of diverse locations, unpredictable weather, unexpected events, and unique narratives.

Danger along the path to Lost Heaven
Confront unyielding threats to survival, including mutated creatures, resource scarcity, and unstable environment. Safeguard your train, ensuring its resilience and continued journey through this perilous landscape.
